name: Kuma no Pooh-tarou: Sora wa Pink da! Zen'in Shuugou!!
overview: Kuma no Puutarou (aka Kuma no Puutarou - Karaha Pinkuda Zenin Shuugou Soredamessu) is a board game based on a 30 episodes anime TV series by Nakagawa Isami that was a comedy involving a loud-mouthed bear, a rabbit with a tendency to fall in love with everything in sight and a monkey with a microphone. The game is a classic board game that features up to 4 human player to play at the same time, in which the goal is to reach the last floor of the board before the other characters do it, to do that the player can use speacial items to attack them, and there are also different mini games to improve the energy of the character or decrease it.
